forecast.name: Tonight
forecast.detailedForecast: Mostly clear, with a low around 50. South southwest wind 2 to 6 mph.

forecast.name: Monday
forecast.detailedForecast: Sunny. High near 69, with temperatures falling to around 66 in the afternoon. West wind 2 to 10 mph.

weather_report:
In the heart of Downtown San Francisco, the night unfolds beneath a mostly clear sky, cradling a low temperature around 50 degrees. A gentle south-southwest breeze whispers softly, barely stirring the atmosphere. As the day dawns, the city will welcome the sun with open arms, basking in the warmth of a high near 69. The crisp morning air, tinged with a hint of salt from the bay, gives way to a sunlit tapestry—crowning the city with a touch of golden light as temperatures lovingly ease into the afternoon.

The promise of clarity dances in the sunlit sky, though one might discern whispers of marine layer lingering, softening the edges of the landscape, particularly where the ocean meets the horizon. Dressing in layers will be your best ally; perhaps a light jacket for the cooler morning breeze and a simple shirt for the brighter afternoon. This weather beckons leisurely strolls along the waterfront or a quiet visit to one of the city’s many tucked-away cafes, where one can sip on a warm beverage while observing the world awaken. Whether you choose to enjoy a solitary adventure or meet friends for a morning brunch, the day ahead holds an abundance of serene possibilities, a gentle reminder of the beauty found in simplicity.
